text: Hey team, looking to work with Layla Campbell for Grill'd. Budget is approx $5,894 - need 3 x Social media takeover, 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x YouTube short. 5 weeks exclusivity, 5 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: November 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $5,894 budget
